channel.title: Comments on: Corona Geek #45 – Is NOOK Color Dead, Ouya Sells Out, Become a Corona SDK Hotshot

item.title: By: Larry Meadows
item.dc:creator: Larry Meadows
item.description:
A friend told me they were contacted about working on a Windows 8 device for B&N / Nook division within the last 40 days....
something new is going on...
just FYI
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: helios narcissus
item.dc:creator: helios narcissus
item.description: aha! finally saw two of my CORONA SDK coaches, roaminggamer and jesse warden!! yohoOO! u guyz rock . .looking forward to buying "HOTSHOT" . .im intrigued that Mr Flanagan did Assembly, wow^^
